column5: hey everyone how are you I was wondering where in Port colborne can I fish for channel catfish I have no idea where to fish for them me and my girlfriend are going out soon very first time being here so if anybody can point me in the right direction to  good spots please help me the u in advance

Cats are in the Grand river near Dunnville.  Go to Fishmasters bait, tackle & charter service.  They'll point you in the right direction.  I've never heard of cats being caught in Port Colborne.  Although they may be there.
Could try the Welland River, get a few out near the Welland Airport at a small conservation area there.
